comment: Ordinal multiplication with zero. Definition 8.15(a) of [TakeutiZaring] p. 62. See ~ om0x for a way to remove the antecedent ` A e. On ` . (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2013.)
